General.Name: Shenzhen Longli Technology Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Shenzhen Longli Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of LED backlight display modules in China and internationally. The company offers back lights and professional displays. Its products are used in communication, computer, industrial control, automotive, medical display, and other fields. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Building G, Guanghao Industrial Park, Shenzhen, China, 518000
